knimeNode.name: The Looper's Tail
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node at the tail of a loop

fullDescription.intro: The Looper's Tail is the node that end a loop that is executed a predefined number of times. At the start of the loop you need The Looper's head, where you can defined how many times the loop should be executed. All nodes in between are executed that many times.

ports.dataOut: Collected results from the loop body
